# Streamlit thesis pages expansion

## Summary
- Added individual Streamlit pages for projected geometry, temporal response, sky contribution, and noise sensitivity sections.
- Simplified main landing page to describe navigation to dedicated pages.

- web/pages/05_projected_geometry.py

- web/pages/07_sky_contribution.py
- web/pages/08_noise_sensitivity.py
